channel.title: Hardstyle [Raw] on DJ IHaveAHat
channel.description: Recent content in Hardstyle [Raw] on DJ IHaveAHat

item.title: Raw Hardstyle Mix (17#49)
item.description: Still playing a game of catch(-up), so catch these raw hard beats!

item.title: Raw Hardstyle Mix (17#47)
item.description: The ting goes skra, and so does this raw hardstyle set, enjoy!

item.title: Raw Hardstyle Mix (17#44)
item.description: We’re going raw & hard this week, bringing you an hour of raw hardstyle!

item.title: Hardstyle Mix (17#38)
item.description: This week we’re bringing you sounds from all across the hardstyle spectrum, melodic, euphoric, raw & more!

item.title: A Bit Of Everything Mix (17#37)
item.description: Why have one genre when you can have ALL the genres, and that’s exactly what we have this week! A journey from slow to fast through various styles of dance music.

item.title: Raw Hardstyle Mix (17#36)
item.description: In this week’s set we’ve got an hour of raw hardstyle screeches, kicks, melodies & more.

item.title: Raw Hardstyle Mix (17#33)
item.description: Another week, another set. This week we’re bringing you an hour of raw hardstyle beats & melodies

item.title: Raw Hardstyle Mix (17#27)
item.description: This week we’re returning to raw hardstyle sounds with an hour of heavy beats and raw melodies.

item.title: Raw Hardstyle Mix (17#20)
item.description: Here comes the bass train, with this week’s hard hitting set, chock-full of the latest and greatest raw hardstyle tracks

item.title: Raw Hardstyle Mix (17#17)
item.description: Crashing in with an hour of raw hardstyle, we’re going all out on the hard & heavy this week, with some melodic influences here and there.

item.title: Raw Hardstyle Mix (17#11)
item.description: We’ve got a great line-up of tracks for you this week, with cheesy, melodic and just plain loud raw hardstyle

item.title: Euphoric & Raw Hardstyle Mix (17#09)
item.description: Let’s have an hour of euphoric beats to brighten up our day after a dark and gloomy week.

item.title: Raw Hardstyle Mix (17#03)
item.description: Enough of those uplifting melodies for now, time for some hard raw beats in this week’s raw hardstyle mix

item.title: Raw & Euphoric Hardstyle Mix (2016-11-03)
item.description: This week we’re starting with uplifting euphoric melodies moving through to raw and heavy beats at the end

item.title: Raw Hardstyle Mix (2016-10-18)
item.description: We’re bringing hard hitting beats and melodic flavours in this week’s raw hardstyle mix

item.title: Raw Hardstyle Mix (2016-07-30)
item.description: And to end the week, some fistpumping, body rocking raw hardstyle

item.title: Melodic Rawstyle Mix (2016-04-30)
item.description: Another week, another mix. Raw and melodic, a wonderful combination, especially if you need a break from the usual screechfest.
